text:
I am trying to use module mod_webapp.so to configure Apache to use TC to 
service jsp pages and servlets. I get an error "Unable to load mod_webapp.so 
into server. Undefined Symbol: ap_table_get. Httpd cannot start". I included 
the line "LoadModule webapp_module modules/mod_webapp.so" into my httpd.conf 
file. I downloaded the binary from http://jakarta.apache.org/builds/jakarta-
tomcat-4.0/release/v4.0.3/bin/linux/i386/mod_webapp.so and put it into my 
Apache modules directory. Unable to do anything.
creator: Alexandra.Nsonwu@am.sony.com

text:
The files in
http://jakarta.apache.org/builds/jakarta-tomcat-4.0/release/v4.0.3/bin/linux/i386/
are for httpd 1.3 not 2.0
For httpd 2.0 you have to build mod_webapp.so using the sources or wait for the
next TC release.
creator: jfclere@gmail.com
